_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The different rebirths based on the amou: Reborn in the company of the Gods of the Four Great Kings
Reborn in the company of the Gods of the Thirty-Three
Reborn in the company of the Gods of Yama
Reborn in the company of the Joyful Gods
Reborn in the company of the Gods Who Love to Create
Reborn in the company of the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
